name: Sapling (itch) (dwdraws)
description:
Sprout your sapling and find your way up from the forest floor!

  • Escape the forest floor
  • Gather energy from sunlight as you climb upward
  • Manage your sapling's energy needs as it grows in bigger
  • Explore and create a route through each level
  • Don't run out of energy or your poor sapling will die

Continuous development is  the plan. Follow here for updates.

Play the original Jam version
